ModMetaData.name: [NL] Dynamic Portraits
ModMetaData.author: Nals
ModMetaData.description:
This mod displays the following status in the portrait.
1.mood 2. rest 3. hunger
It also changes the brightness of the portrait depending on the colonist's location. In addition, the item what they are using in their work is shown in the portraits. If it is another colonist, it will split the portrait.
